name: Astral Rush
description:
During a minute a countless amount of asteroids will start to drop from the top of the screen.  Your sole objective is to prevent them from reaching the other end of the screen with the help of your trustworthy mouse to destroy them.

Around every 5 seconds between 2 to 5 small asteroids will spawn in random positions, and around 10 seconds a bigger asteroid appears. The difference between these two threats are that the smaller asteroid is slower than its opposite, and the bigger version breaks down in two once being destroyed.

This game will surely test your reflexes as one mistake could lead to your inminent downfall.

How long will you last?

How much will you score?

Find out now!!

Controls: 

                           Destroy Asteroid - Mouse 1

                          Restart Game - R
